member.name: T:Google.GData.Photos.KindQuery
member.summary: A subclass of PicasaQuery, to create an Album query URI. Provides public properties that describe the different aspects of the URI, as well as a composite URI. The AlbumQuery automatically set's the kind parameter to Album

member.name: T:Google.GData.Photos.PicasaQuery
member.summary: A subclass of FeedQuery, to create an PicasaQuery query URI. Provides public properties that describe the different aspects of the URI, as well as a composite URI. The PicasaQuery supports the following GData parameters: start-index and max-results parameters. It does not currently support the other standard parameters. in addition, the following parameters: Parameter Meaning kind what feed to retrieve access Visibility parameter thumbsize Thumbnail size parameter

member.name: M:Google.GData.Photos.PicasaQuery.#ctor
member.summary: base constructor

member.name: M:Google.GData.Photos.PicasaQuery.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: base constructor, with initial queryUri

member.name: M:Google.GData.Photos.PicasaQuery.ParseUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: protected void ParseUri
member.param: takes an incoming Uri string and parses all the properties out of it
member.returns: throws a query exception when it finds something wrong with the input, otherwise returns a baseuri

member.name: M:Google.GData.Photos.PicasaQuery.Reset
member.summary: Resets object state to default, as if newly created.

member.summary: Creates the partial URI query string based on all set properties.
member.returns: string => the query part of the URI
